members.name: Rodolfo Pironato
members.bio: The market's difficulty in offering simple, fast and practical solutions is evident. TurnBold was born with the purpose of innovating and including AI in our daily routines. With a highly skilled team, we are ready to transform complexity into simplicity, making our tasks more efficient and productive.

members.name: Ricardo Moreira
members.bio: As Marketing Manager at TurnBold, my mission is to connect our innovative solutions with real market needs. I work daily to position the company as a reference in digital transformation, developing strategies that highlight our differential in AI and legacy system modernization.

members.name: Fernanda Alves
members.bio: At TurnBold, I lead our strategic vision of sustainable growth and continuous innovation. My focus is on ensuring we maintain our operational excellence while expanding our solutions portfolio. I believe the company's success is directly linked to our clients' success.

members.name: Ana Costa
members.bio: As Head of UX/UI at TurnBold, I am responsible for creating digital experiences that transform complexity into simplicity. My work involves ensuring all our solutions are intuitive and user-centered, applying the best design principles to maximize efficiency and satisfaction of our clients.

meta.title: TurnBold FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions about AI Virtual Assistants
meta.description: Find answers to key questions about our virtual assistants, AI training, performance reports and service policies.
meta.keywords: FAQ, frequently asked questions, virtual assistants, AI training, support, refund, small business, custom packages

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our products and services. If you don't find what you're looking for, contact us.

questions.question: How do you train your Virtual Assistants?
questions.answer: Our training process is based on multiple criteria, including experience, business sector analysis, and client business data. We ensure that AI learning is done with rigor and precision.

questions.question: How can we track progress?
questions.answer: We provide regular updates and detailed reports on activities performed. Additionally, we offer tracking tools to monitor tasks in real-time.

questions.question: Do you offer performance reports?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide periodic reports with performance metrics, productivity, and progress on delegated activities.

questions.question: Who should I contact in case of complaints?
questions.answer: Our customer support team is available to resolve any issues. You can contact us by email, phone, or through your business manager.

questions.question: What is the refund policy?
questions.answer: Our refund policy is simple and straightforward. For more details, check the Terms and Conditions available on our website.

questions.question: Do you have a dedicated support team?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a specialized team to provide support and ensure the best experience for our clients.

questions.question: I have a small business. Do I need a Virtual Assistant?
questions.answer: Small businesses can benefit significantly from Virtual Assistants, as they help optimize time, manage administrative tasks, and improve productivity.

questions.question: Do you offer custom packages?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer custom packages to meet your business specific needs. Contact us to discuss an ideal solution for you.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept payments via credit card and PIX. For more information about payment options, contact our support team.

search.noResultsDescription: We couldn't find questions related to your search. Try other terms or contact us.

cta.title: Didn't Find Your Answer?
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you. Contact us through our support channels.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - TurnBold Solutions
meta.description: Learn how TurnBold collects, uses and protects your personal information. Our privacy policy details our commitment to your data security.
meta.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, LGPD, data security, TurnBold

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: Learn how TurnBold collects, uses and protects your personal information.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: TurnBold values the privacy and security of its users' data. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use and protect personal information provided by users when using our CRM and Artificial Intelligence (AI) services.

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.content: 2.1. TurnBold may collect the following types of information:
items: Registration data: Name, email, phone and payment information;
Usage data: Information about system usage and interactions with our platforms;
Technical information: IP address, browser type and device settings.
sections.additionalContent: 2.2. Data is collected when the user:

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: 3.1. The collected information is used to:
items: Provide and improve TurnBold services;
Process payments and manage subscriptions;
Personalize user experience;
Send relevant communications, such as notifications about updates and promotions;
Ensure security and prevent fraud.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: 4.1. TurnBold does not sell, rent or share personal data with third parties, except:
items: With essential service providers (payment processing, hosting);
When required by law or court order;
To protect rights, property or safety of the company and users;
With express user consent.
sections.additionalContent: 4.2. All partners and service providers are required to maintain data confidentiality and security.

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content: 5.1. TurnBold implements technical and organizational measures to protect personal data:
items: Data encryption in transit and at rest;
Strict access controls;
Continuous security monitoring;
Regular and secure backups;
Team training in information security.
sections.additionalContent: 5.2. In case of a security incident, affected users will be notified as required by applicable legislation.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: 6.1. Personal data is kept for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy or as required by law.
sections.additionalContent: 6.2. Users may request deletion of their data through formal request, respecting any legal obligations.

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: 7.1. Users have the right to:
items: Access, correct or delete their personal data;
Request information about the processing of their data;
Revoke consent for data use, when applicable.
sections.additionalContent: 7.2. To exercise these rights, users must contact TurnBold through the support channels available on the website.

sections.title: Changes to this Policy
sections.content: 8.1. TurnBold reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be communicated to users through the website or registered email.

sections.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
sections.content: 9.1. TurnBold uses cookies and similar technologies to:
items: Improve user browsing experience;
Personalize content and advertisements;
Analyze platform traffic and usage;
Maintain user preferences and settings;
Ensure security and functionality of services.
sections.subtitle: 9.2. Types of cookies used:

cookieTypes.description: Collect information about how users use the site;
Allow the site to remember user choices;
Used to personalize advertisements and content.

sections.additionalContent: 9.3. Users can manage their cookie preferences through browser settings or the consent banner displayed on the site.
sections.finalNote: 9.4. Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some platform features.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: 10.1. If you have questions about this policy, contact us through the support channels available on our website.

agreement.text: By using TurnBold services, you declare that you have read and agree to this Privacy Policy.

meta.title: Refund Policy - TurnBold Solutions
meta.description: Learn about the guidelines for refund requests related to our CRM and Artificial Intelligence services.
meta.keywords: refund policy, refund, TurnBold, CRM, artificial intelligence, cancellation, subscription

header.title: Refund Policy
header.subtitle: Learn about the guidelines for refund requests related to our CRM and Artificial Intelligence services.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: TurnBold values transparency and customer satisfaction. This Refund Policy establishes guidelines for refund requests related to our CRM and Artificial Intelligence (AI) services. By using our services, you agree to the terms described below.

sections.title: Refund Conditions
sections.content: 2.1. Refunds will be granted only in specific cases, as described in this policy.
sections.additionalContent: 2.2. Users may request refunds for subscription plans within 7 (seven) days from the date of first purchase, in accordance with Consumer Protection Code.
sections.finalNote: 2.3. For custom services or software development under contract, refunds will not be granted after contract signing and development initiation.

sections.title: Request Procedure
sections.content: 3.1. The user must send the refund request in writing through the support email provided on the TurnBold website.
sections.subtitle: 3.2. The request must include:
items: Full name of the user or company;
Purchase date;
Detailed reason for the refund request.
sections.additionalContent: 3.3. TurnBold will analyze the request within 5 (five) business days and notify the user about the decision.

sections.title: Payment Refunds
sections.content: 4.1. If the refund is approved, the amount will be returned to the same payment method used in the purchase.
sections.additionalContent: 4.2. The refund processing time may vary according to the financial institution, and may take up to 10 (ten) business days.
sections.finalNote: 4.3. Administrative fees and transaction costs may be deducted from the refund amount, depending on the payment method.

sections.title: Subscription Cancellation
sections.content: 5.1. The user may cancel their subscription at any time, without future penalties.
sections.additionalContent: 5.2. Cancellation stops automatic subscription renewal, but service access will remain available until the end of the already paid period.
sections.finalNote: 5.3. No refunds are granted for already used subscription periods.

sections.title: Exceptions
sections.content: 6.1. Refunds will not be granted in the following cases:
items: Improper use or user negligence regarding the service;
Requests made after the 7-day deadline for subscription refunds;
Custom services or services under contract.

sections.title: Changes to this Policy
sections.content: 7.1. TurnBold reserves the right to change this Refund Policy at any time. The user will be notified about relevant changes by email or through our website.

agreement.text: If you have questions, contact our support team. By using our services, you declare that you have read and agree to this Refund Policy.

meta.title: Terms and Conditions - TurnBold Solutions
meta.description: Learn about the terms and conditions of use of our CRM and Artificial Intelligence services.
meta.keywords: terms and conditions, terms of use, TurnBold, CRM, artificial intelligence, contracts, policies

header.title: Terms and Conditions
header.subtitle: Learn about the terms and conditions of use of our CRM and Artificial Intelligence services.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to TurnBold! These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our CRM Systems and Artificial Intelligence (AI) services aimed at small and medium-sized businesses. By using our services, you agree to the terms below. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

items.definition: Software service provider company, including CRM systems and AI solutions.
Individual or legal entity that acquires and uses TurnBold services.
Monthly access to software and development of customized solutions.

sections.title: Use of Services
sections.content: 3.1. Users can access software through monthly subscription or contract the development of customized solutions through commercial proposal.
sections.additionalContent: 3.2. The use of software for illegal, fraudulent activities or activities that infringe third-party rights is prohibited.
sections.finalNote: 3.3. Access to systems is personal and non-transferable, and sharing of credentials is prohibited.

sections.title: Plans and Payments
sections.content: 4.1. The use of services is conditional on payment of fees according to current plans.
sections.additionalContent: 4.2. Payments are made on a recurring basis and can be canceled at any time, according to cancellation policies.
sections.finalNote: 4.3. TurnBold reserves the right to adjust prices with 30 days' prior notice.

sections.title: Custom Software Development
sections.content: 5.1. The development of customized solutions will be subject to signing a specific contract.
sections.additionalContent: 5.2. The intellectual property of developed systems may be negotiated according to the contract signed between the parties.

sections.title: Support and Maintenance
sections.content: 6.1. Support will be provided during business hours, through the channels informed on the TurnBold website.
sections.additionalContent: 6.2. Corrective maintenance will be performed at no additional cost for internal problems of software provided by TurnBold.
sections.finalNote: 6.3. Improvements and updates may be made available according to the company's schedule.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: 7.1. All software provided by TurnBold is protected by copyright and intellectual property rights.
sections.additionalContent: 7.2. The use of software is granted by license and does not transfer any property rights to the user.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: 8.1. TurnBold is not responsible for indirect damages, lost profits or losses arising from improper use of the systems.
sections.additionalContent: 8.2. The use of services is the sole responsibility of the user.

sections.title: Cancellation and Termination
sections.content: 9.1. The user can cancel the subscription at any time, observing the refund policies.
sections.additionalContent: 9.2. TurnBold may terminate access to services in case of default or violation of terms of use.

sections.title: General Provisions
sections.content: 10.1. These Terms may be updated periodically, and the user will be notified of relevant changes.
sections.additionalContent: 10.2. Any dispute will be resolved in accordance with the laws of the country where TurnBold is registered.

agreement.text: By using our services, you declare that you have read and agree to these Terms and Conditions.

meta.title: Legal Notice - TurnBold Solutions
meta.description: Important information about the use of our services and TurnBold Solutions website.
meta.keywords: legal notice, terms of use, limitation of liability, intellectual property, TurnBold

header.title: Legal Notice
header.subtitle: Important information about the use of our services and website.

sections.title: General Information
sections.content: This website and TurnBold services are provided "as is", without warranties of any kind, express or implied. TurnBold strives to ensure that the information provided is accurate and up-to-date, but does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or suitability of such information for any specific purpose.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: 2.1. All content available on the TurnBold website is merely informative and does not constitute professional or technical advice.
sections.additionalContent: 2.2. The use of the information or services provided is entirely the user's responsibility.
sections.finalNote: 2.3. TurnBold is not responsible for decisions made based on the website content or for the use of its services without proper professional analysis.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: 3.1. TurnBold is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use its services.
sections.additionalContent: 3.2. The user is responsible for ensuring that TurnBold services meet their needs before contracting.
sections.finalNote: 3.3. Under no circumstances shall TurnBold's liability exceed the amount paid by the user for the contracted services.

sections.title: Third Party Links
sections.content: 4.1. The TurnBold website may contain links to third-party sites. TurnBold is not responsible for the content, privacy policies or practices of these external sites.
sections.finalNote: 4.2. The use of links to third-party sites occurs at the user's own risk.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: 5.1. All content, including texts, images, logos, software and other materials, is owned by TurnBold or its licensors, being protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.
sections.finalNote: 5.2. Improper use of content may result in legal sanctions, including lawsuits and applicable penalties.

sections.title: Changes to Legal Notice
sections.content: 6.1. TurnBold reserves the right to modify this Legal Notice at any time. Changes will be published on the website and will take effect immediately.
sections.finalNote: 6.2. Continued use of services after changes implies acceptance of the new terms.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: 7.1. To clarify questions about this Legal Notice, contact our support team through the channels available on the TurnBold website.

agreement.text: By using the TurnBold website and services, you agree to the terms of this Legal Notice.
